name: Room Escape Games - The Lost Key 6

description:
'Wow! This Game Is Just Amazing! Excitement All The Way!'
'This Free Game Exceeded My Expectations! Download Now!'
'Downright Fun! My Kid Can't Stop Playing It!'
'I Love It When I Reach The Bottom And Catch The Bag Of Gold!'


Welcome to Room Escape - The Lost Key 6, a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Room Escape - The Lost Key?

The Lost Key 6 is the sixth new point and click house escape game sequel developed by the new Bamvd Games for an exciting escape attempt and overall adventure! This game is derived from the previous game as its sequel.

After all you have been through, nothing is still working in-order to help find those lost keys to the house. You actually got this long and look, it’s actually nighttime! Wow, you really went on a whole day rampage! But still, finding those keys is still the first priority in-order for you to leave your house and comeback inside it. Will you be able to find it this time? Good luck!

Play other escape games like Murder Mansion Escape 4 for an awesome escape adventure and added fun!

Good luck and have fun!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
